column2: Upon  a  perusal  of the  judgment  it  is  clear  that  the  learned  District  Judge  has
the  Deeds  placed  before  Court  and  has  come  to
con'ect conclusion  that  Appu Singho,  Subarashamy,  Jamisappu,  Babohamy and
Sarohamy were  the  children of Bastian who  was  the  son  of Eramanis.  It is  also

column1: clear that the tittle claimed by the Plaintiff stems from  very old title deeds.
